title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department agriculture food marine) order 2023

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Barry Cassidy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Barry Cassidy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to Martin Heydon, Minister of State at the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with effect from 21 December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

28 March, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [154] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
